content.description:
Four-year-old Ethan and his mother have the following conversation:
MOTHER: Ethan, do you have a brother?
ETHAN: Yes.
MOTHER: What’s his name?
ETHAN: My brother’s name is Anthony.
MOTHER: Does Anthony have a brother?
ETHAN: No.
content.question: Which of the following concepts does this conversation illustrate?

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
